hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {department.*} from DEPARTMENTS department where department.is_credit_card_office = 1 and department.TB = :extra_regionCodeTB and nvl(department.OSB, 'NULL')!= 'NULL' and nvl(department.OFFICE , 'NULL')!= 'NULL' and upper(department.name) like upper(:extra_like_name) and upper(department.post_address) like upper(:extra_like_region) and upper(department.post_address) like upper(:extra_like_street)
